If this condition isn't passed, the feature won't be placed</comment><next><block type="placement_in_square"><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING_NO_LEAVES</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move each feature to the highest solid block or liquid</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="210">Finally, we check that the feature isn't outside of the biome. This placement modifier should always be the last one.</comment><next><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_list"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="block0">Blocks.GRASS</field><field name="block1">Blocks.TALLGRASS#1</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="feature_custom_structure" x="924" y="-94"><field name="structure">mediummushroompurplecenter</field><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><field name="random_rotation">FALSE</field><field name="random_mirror">FALSE</field><value name="ignored_blocks"><block type="block_holderset_list"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="block0">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value></block><block type="placement_block_survival_filter" x="-510" y="251"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Finally, we check if the position is actually valid. Trees should generate only on blocks that support their sapling.</comment><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">Blocks.SAPLING#0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used to check for the tree position. Generally it should be the sapling of the tree.</comment></block></value></block><block type="feature_tree_spruce" x="903" y="298"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="base_height">5</field><field name="height_variation_a">2</field><field name="height_variation_b">1</field><field name="force_dirt">TRUE</field><field name="ignore_vines">TRUE</field><value name="dirt"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">Blocks.PUMPKIN</field></block></value><value name="trunk"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">Blocks.PLANKS#0</field></block></value><value name="foliage"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value><value name="radius"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">0</field><field name="max">1</field></block></value><value name="trunk_height"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">1</field><field name="max">2</field></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"></block></value></block><block type="placement_in_square" x="1051" y="2449"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each feature horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment></block><block type="int_provider_constant" x="719" y="2487"><field name="value">8</field></block><block type="placement_in_square" x="-95" y="2553"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each tree horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment></block><block type="placement_count_on_every_layer" x="916" y="2537"></block><block type="placement_surface_water_depth" x="-59" y="2633"><field name="depth">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is how deep the water can be for the tree to generate. If the value is 0, the tree will never be submerged</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move each feature to the highest solid block (which might be underwater)</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="210">We check that the tree doesn't generate in the wrong biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block><block type="int_provider_constant" x="892" y="2618"><field name="value">4</field></block><block type="feature_simple_random_selector" x="-510" y="2728"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><value name="feature0"><block type="feature_tree_simple"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="type">oak</field><field name="base_height">4</field><field name="height_variation_a">2</field><field name="height_variation_b">0</field><field name="force_dirt">FALSE</field><field name="ignore_vines">TRUE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This block represents an oak tree, and should generate during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage.</comment><value name="dirt"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">Blocks.DIRT#0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that will w="160">This is the block used for the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="foliage"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">Blocks.LEAVES#0</field><comment trunk</comment></block></value><value name="trunk"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">Blocks.LOG#0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the leaves</comment></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Oak trees don't have
